name: code-review
description: Perform a thorough code review with best practice recommendations
content:
Perform a thorough code review focusing on:

## Code Quality
- Readability and clarity
- Consistent naming conventions
- Proper code organization
- DRY principle adherence
- Single responsibility principle

## Potential Issues
- Bug risks and edge cases
- Error handling completeness
- Resource leaks (memory, connections, file handles)
- Race conditions or concurrency issues
- Performance bottlenecks

## Best Practices
- Testing coverage and quality
- Documentation completeness
- Logging appropriateness
- Configuration management
- Dependency management

Provide actionable feedback with specific file locations and suggested improvements.

arguments.name: focus-area
arguments.description: Specific area to focus the review on (e.g., performance, security)
